Name: ad movere
About the game: Ingrid is an aspiring young woman who is close to getting her big break! But, unfortunately, life throws many trials her way, and it's up to you to help her succeed! Sanity is irrelevant when you can bend space time to your will... Ad Movere is a psychological horror visual novel that follows Ingrid Nelson, a 20-year old art school student, as she navigates the struggles of college, making a name for herself, and controlling a gradually unwinding time bending power that threatens to destroy everything she knows. KEY FEATURES Beautifully crafted sprite art and CGs! A gripping narrative! A captivating soundtrack! Every choice you make influences the story, choose wisely. -EPISODES- Episode One - Chiseled (OUT NOW!) Episode Two - Fixed Point (COMING 2021) EPILEPSY WARNING This game does contain flashing lights and images, play at your own discretion.
